title: Chiefmonkey
author: Chiefmonkey
content: Hello All,I've just launched a new Lightning Powered Auction Site https://plebeian.market/This is the very first auction can be seen here:https://plebeian.market/auctions/JYIt's just a fun piece to get the market started.  Anyone can sell anything though and the platform is based on a value4value model.This means that it doesn't cost you anything to use it but the seller can chose to donate up to 5% of the sale to us.All sats donated go to supporting ourselves and other Bitcoin Free Open Source Software projects.I will be auctioning 1 item each day this week.  All small fun things.If you would like to auction something, feel free

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: awesome! would merit but I am plum out atm - will do so once I have more.looking forward to seeing this progress.

comments.author: Chiefmonkey
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 21, 2022, 07:58:32 PMlooking forward to seeing this progress.Cheers Mopar There's many more developments coming... we've done all the hard work and now we're simply building out new apps from it btw you can also use it to trade your coins

comments.author: Chiefmonkey
comments.body: Quote from: haloxon on June 21, 2022, 08:06:16 PMall your artworks from cypherpunk series that I own still are one of my favorites  thank you thank youI will make some more again... I just have had a lot of distractions recently working with devs building this platform... we've created our own rabbit hole of possibilities

comments.author: SatsLife
comments.body: Congrats on the launch! Looking forward to this!

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Great work Chiefmonkey  Love to see a new auction site and hopefully we can all help to make it take off  First auction going well  All out of merits too - we need a merit spree in collectibles

comments.author: Chiefmonkey
comments.body: Quote from: SatsLife on June 21, 2022, 08:18:24 PMCongrats on the launch! Looking forward to this!Thank you mate... fingers crossed

comments.author: Chiefmonkey
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on June 21, 2022, 08:27:44 PMGreat work Chiefmonkey  Love to see a new auction site and hopefully we can all help to make it take off  First auction going well  This isn't just any auction site   As you see it develop, it will become more and more decentralised... we are building Wordpress plugins for people to run it off their own websites and also a version so that people can run it off their own node Everything is FOSSSo hopefully people will reuse our template and duplicate things further All bids are 21 sats and go to supporting FOSS bitcoin projects on lightning

comments.author: vizique
comments.body: I'm really excited about where the Chief is taking all this.A long awaited and overdue solution to sales for physical stuff!!squeee!!!Viz

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: @Chiefmonkey welcome back i am very curious which things you will offer us on your very fine site as an auction ... maybe i will find something interesting for my collection  Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on June 21, 2022, 07:58:32 PM✂would merit but I am plum out atm - will do so once I have more.✂Quote from: Mbitr on June 21, 2022, 08:27:44 PM✂All out of merits too - we need a merit spree in collectibles  have donated some merits for you guys and of course from me as well

comments.author: Chiefmonkey
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on June 23, 2022, 09:38:47 AMMay I ask how do get to a (complete) list of ongoing and/or previous auctions?I thought through twitter (@PlebeianMarket) but e.g. Forever Laura 1 of 2 is not listed there...And nothing on the main site as well.Hello tldr-hodlYes a full market place listing is being worked on as we speak It will be put live today or tomorrow... just asap imminently

comments.author: Chiefmonkey
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on June 23, 2022, 11:11:17 AM@Chiefmonkey welcome back i am very curious which things you will offer us on your very fine site as an auction ... maybe i will find something interesting for my collection  Hello cygan,It's an open marketplace so anyone can list anything they want

comments.author: Chiefmonkey
comments.body: There you go:https://plebeian.market/We now have a new homepage that shows you new listings

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Cool project.Jfyi: Website's content disappears after a few seconds (blank white page) in Firefox (latest version).Everything seems to work fine in Chrome browser, though.

comments.author: Chiefmonkey
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on June 24, 2022, 11:38:02 AMOooo... stylish!Do you plan to keep archive of finished auctions?PS: If I may, please add also username of seller, preferably clickable so one can see his other auctions...Also, with Twitter integration already in place, could you make an account (either @PlebeianMarket or a separate one) with all current auctions?Pretty much yes to everything you've asked... we are constantly updating the site Thank you so much for your support

comments.author: Chiefmonkey
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on June 24, 2022, 12:17:39 PMCool project.Jfyi: Website's content disappears after a few seconds (blank white page) in Firefox (latest version).Everything seems to work fine in Chrome browser, though.Thank you and thank you for your feedback too... I'll pass it on to the team

comments.author: Kenneth B Moon
comments.body: Assume platform Cheifmonkey, Thanks for creating such a cool space.Boom!

comments.author: Frank AlpenCoin
comments.body: New Auction:https://plebeian.market/auctions/6IThank you Cheifmonkey for this new platform...
